Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Histone H2B-1(HLP-1) (BWQ, natural AMPs; fish, animals, unclassified; More AMPs: HLP-2,large, 30 kDa, also antifungal, sequence unknown)

Literature Information.Literature: Warning: Only the N-terminal sequence is presented. HLP-1 is the major component isolated (15.5 kDa).Activity: Inhibitory to two A. hydrophila isolates (MIC 50 ug/mL), V. alginolyticus, E. coli D31 (MBC 0.37 uM), and fish fungal pathogen Saprolegnia.Updated 5/2020 GW
Literature Information.Author: Robinette D., Wada S., Arroll T., Levy MG., Miller WL., Noga EJ.1998
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial activity in the skin of the channel catfish Ictalurus punctatus: characterization of broad-spectrum histone-like antimicrobial proteins.
